input:
Alice, Bob, Claire, Dave, and Eve are dancers at a square dance. At the start of a song, they each have a partner: Alice is dancing with Karl, Bob is dancing with Melissa, Claire is dancing with Lola, Dave is dancing with Sam, and Eve is dancing with Izzi.
Throughout the song, the dancers often trade partners. First, Claire and Dave switch partners. Then, Eve and Bob switch partners. Then, Claire and Alice switch partners. Then, Eve and Alice switch partners. Finally, Claire and Dave switch partners. At the end of the dance, Bob is dancing with
Options:
(A) Karl
(B) Melissa
(C) Lola
(D) Sam
(E) Izzi

Alice, Bob, Claire, Dave, and Eve are on the same team in a soccer match. At the start of the match, they are each assigned to a position: Alice is playing goalkeeper, Bob is playing left winger, Claire is playing benchwarmer, Dave is playing cheerleader, and Eve is playing left midfielder.
As the game progresses, pairs of players occasionally swap positions. First, Eve and Alice trade positions. Then, Bob and Eve trade positions. Then, Alice and Dave trade positions. Then, Bob and Eve trade positions. Finally, Eve and Claire trade positions. At the end of the match, Eve is playing
Options:
(A) goalkeeper
(B) left winger
(C) benchwarmer
(D) cheerleader
(E) left midfielder

Alice, Bob, Claire, Dave, and Eve are playing a game. At the start of the game, they are each holding a ball: Alice has a green ball, Bob has a purple ball, Claire has a black ball, Dave has a blue ball, and Eve has a red ball.
As the game progresses, pairs of players trade balls. First, Dave and Eve swap balls. Then, Bob and Alice swap balls. Then, Eve and Claire swap balls. Then, Bob and Dave swap balls. Finally, Dave and Claire swap balls. At the end of the game, Claire has the
Options:
(A) green ball
(B) purple ball
(C) black ball
(D) blue ball
(E) red ball

Alice, Bob, Claire, Dave, and Eve are playing a game. At the start of the game, they are each holding a ball: Alice has a orange ball, Bob has a blue ball, Claire has a black ball, Dave has a white ball, and Eve has a purple ball.
As the game progresses, pairs of players trade balls. First, Bob and Dave swap balls. Then, Claire and Eve swap balls. Then, Dave and Eve swap balls. Then, Claire and Dave swap balls. Finally, Alice and Bob swap balls. At the end of the game, Dave has the
Options:
(A) orange ball
(B) blue ball
(C) black ball
(D) white ball
(E) purple ball

Alice, Bob, Claire, Dave, and Eve are playing a game. At the start of the game, they are each holding a ball: Alice has a red ball, Bob has a green ball, Claire has a brown ball, Dave has a black ball, and Eve has a orange ball.
As the game progresses, pairs of players trade balls. First, Claire and Alice swap balls. Then, Dave and Eve swap balls. Then, Claire and Eve swap balls. Then, Bob and Claire swap balls. Finally, Alice and Claire swap balls. At the end of the game, Alice has the
Options:
(A) red ball
(B) green ball
(C) brown ball
(D) black ball
(E) orange ball
